subtitle: Baby regurgitates milk
title: Worried Dad
content:
My 18 days old baby has been throwing up every time after nursing ever since he was born. But it wasn’t as much as it is today. I am really worried this time.The pediatrician said that it is a normal thing for babies. But if this keeps going on like this he’ll end up with no food in his stomach.

I’ve also noticed that his stool is quite sticky. Is this normal?
He also seems to be a bit restless. He keeps twisting and turning all the time. 


**MAMA HELP: Gently pat on the back after feeding your baby – it will help him burp and prevent throwing up. If you think your baby is throwing up a lot, you can give your baby simethicone drop.  Sticky stool is normal for his age.**
